peripheral.name: DRY
peripheral.description: Tamper Detect and Secure Key Storage

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding Secure Key Register has not been initialized since last invalidation, tamper or reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding Secure Key Register has been initialized since last invalidation, tamper or reset

register.name: SKWLR
register.description: DryIce Secure Key Write Lock Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding Secure Key Register is locked and cannot be written by software

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding Secure Key Register can be written by software

register.name: SKRLR
register.description: DryIce Secure Key Read Lock Register

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding Secure Key Register is locked and cannot be read by software

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Corresponding Secure Key Register can be read by software

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: No effect

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Perform a software reset

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce clock and prescaler are disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce clock and prescaler are enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Do not force chip reset when tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Force chip reset when tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce Status Register cannot be written when the Status Register Lock bit within the Lock Register (LR[SRL]) is clear

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce Status Register cannot be written when the Status Register Lock bit within the Lock Register (LR[SRL]) is clear and DryIce Tamper Flag (SR[DTF]) is set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Hysteresis is set to a range of 305 mV to 440 mV

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Hysteresis is set to a range of 490 mV to 705 mV

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pins are configured with passive input filter disabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pins are configured with passive input filter enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pins are configured for low drive strength

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pins are configured for high drive strength

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pins are configured for slow slew rate

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pins are configured for fast slew rate

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce tampering not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce tampering detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: DryIce Tamper Flag (SR[DTF]) is clear or chip reset has not occurred after DryIce Tamper Flag (SR[DTF]) was set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Chip reset has occurred after DryIce Tamper Flag (SR[DTF]) was set

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC time overflow tamper detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC monotonic overflow tamper detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Voltage tampering detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Clock tampering detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Temperature tampering detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Security module tamper detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Flash security tamper detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Test mode tamper detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin tamper detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Secure key valid register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Secure key valid register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Secure Key Write Lock Register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Secure Key Write Lock Register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Secure Key Read Lock Register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Secure Key Read Lock Register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Control register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Control register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Status Register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Status Register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Lock register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Lock register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enable register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Interrupt enable register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper seconds register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper seconds register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper enable register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper enable register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pin direction register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pin direction register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pin polarity register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pin polarity register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Active tamper register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Active tamper register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pin glitch filter register is locked and writes are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pin glitch filter register is not locked and writes complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When DryIce Tamper Flag (SR[DTF]) is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When DryIce Tamper Flag (SR[DTF]) is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When time overflow flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When time overflow flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When monotonic overflow flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When monotonic overflow flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When voltage tamper flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When voltage tamper flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When clock tamper flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When clock tamper flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When temperature tamper flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When temperature tamper flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When security tamper flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When security tamper flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When flash security flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When flash security flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When test mode flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When test mode flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When corresponding tamper pin flag is set, an interrupt is not generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When corresponding tamper pin flag is set, an interrupt is generated

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When time overflow flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When time overflow flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When monotonic overflow flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When monotonic overflow flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When voltage tamper flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When voltage tamper flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When clock tamper flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When clock tamper flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When temperature tamper flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When temperature tamper flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When security tamper flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When security tamper flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When flash security flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When flash security flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When test mode flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When test mode flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: When corresponding tamper pin flag is set, tampering is not detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: When corresponding tamper pin flag is set, tampering is detected

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin is input

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin is output and drives inverse of expected value (tamper pin is asserted)

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin output data is logic zero

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin output data is logic one

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin expected value is not inverted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin expected value is inverted

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin input data (before glitch filter) is logic zero

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin input data (before glitch filter) is logic one

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The glitch filter on tamper pin is clocked by the 512 Hz prescaler clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The glitch filter on tamper pin is clocked by the 32.768 kHz clock

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: The glitch filter on tamper pin is bypassed

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: The glitch filter on tamper pin is enabled

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin expected value is logic zero

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin expected value is active tamper 0 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin expected value is active tamper 1 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b11
enumeratedValue.description: Tamper pin 0 expected value is active tamper 0 output XORed with active tamper 1 output

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Pull resistor is disabled on tamper pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Pull resistor is enabled on tamper pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the secure key valid register are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the secure key valid register complete as normal

field.name: SKWRW
field.description: Secure Key Write Lock Register Write

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the Secure Key Write Lock Register are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Writes to the Secure Key Write Lock Register complete as normal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Reads to the secure key valid register are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1

field.description: Secure Key Write Lock Register Read

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: Reads to the Secure Key Write Lock Register are ignored

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
